definitions.definition: A property of two intersecting submanifolds , where at every intersection point, their separate tangent spaces at that point together generate the tangent space of the ambient manifold at that point.
The quality of connecting or representing a range of heterogeneous elements (fields, kinds of people, etc).

main_definition: ( mathematics ) A property of two intersecting submanifolds , where at every intersection point, their separate tangent spaces at that point together generate the tangent space of the ambient manifold at that point.
secondary_definitions: The quality of connecting or representing a range of heterogeneous elements (fields, kinds of people, etc).
